channel.title: Processes on PrestaShop Project - Open Source e-Commerce platform
channel.description: Recent content in Processes on PrestaShop Project - Open Source e-Commerce platform

item.title: How to contribute to UI tests
item.description: How to contribute to UI tests Introduction Branches The first question to ask when making a contribution is “Which branch should I target?”. The rules are as follows: The development branch for UI testing is the current development branch. The branch changes as soon as the final release is out. Differences between scenarios & tests Scenarios are the base of UI Tests. They are available on the PrestaShop Tests Documentation.

item.title: How to manage Issues
item.description: How to manage Issues This document details the processes in place for the position of “Issues Manager”, a rotating position within the QA community members. The Issue Manager job Your job is to qualify issues submitted to the GitHub project. Good issues help us discover bugs and provide ideas to improve PrestaShop and the native modules. These are the three questions you must ask yourself: Is the issue valid? The issue must be a bug report.
